    school.management.system - package school.management.system
    This package contains classes and interfaces for managing a school system, including user interface components, data handling, and model representations.
    school.management.system.data - package school.management.system.data
    This package contains classes and interfaces for handling data operations within the school management system, including database interactions and data persistence.
